title: Rithm 2.0 / Rithm 1.0
description_short: Rithm is how friends share music.
description_long: I've been working with Rithm since mid-2013 on creating interfaces and unique experiences for a one-of-a-kind music messaging app, out now for iOS and Android! Rithm makes it fun and easy to share and play music with friends through a mobile chat experience. The project has gone through 2 iterations so far, and currently it is in a much simplified state to provide a fun and engaging experience.

title: UX Explorations (Sneak Peak)
description_short: Exploring various ways to re-engage users in delighful ways to improve onboarding, discovery and actionable items.
description_long: Exploring various ways to re-engage users in delighful ways to improve onboarding, discovery and actionable items.

title: Rice (iOS App)
description_short: Rice introduced a new way to trade items
description_long: Rice is a new way to trade items, it is an app that is much simpler to use and made exclusively for mobile. Running in BETA since June 2014.

description_short: Shoebox is a home for your memories
description_long: Shoebox is an app offering free unlimited photo storage, so you can rediscover your photos anywhere!

title: Minimal Note-taking UI
description_short: Really simple, really easy to use note-taking app (Concept)
description_long: I like using evernote, but there's just too much going on at once -- I don't need to share notes, it's cool I can make notebooks but mostly I just need a fast, quick way to take notes.
